Title: Are we ready for borders to reopen?
Paragraphs:
Cross-border travel between Singapore and Malaysia is set to resume – but only on compassionate grounds. Other arrangements like a travel bubble and short-term visits for business have been put on hold, given the escalating Covid-19 situation in both countries.



We asked Singaporeans how they felt about the reopening of the Causeway; 77% are ready for it, but many want restrictions to be in place if it does.
Author: Faizal Kamal
